title: Southern Charm - Madison's Accusation/Snapped
itunes:title: Southern Charm - Madison's Accusation/Snapped
itunes:subtitle: Danny recaps this week's Southern Charm, which features the end of the Colorado trip, a shocking Madison accusation, Cam and Bonnie at the aquarium, and more. Danny also touches on RHOBH reunion part 3, The Nanny, and lots more.
description:
Danny recaps this week's Southern Charm, which features the end of the Colorado trip, a shocking Madison accusation, Cam and Bonnie at the aquarium, and more. Danny also touches on RHOBH reunion part 3, The Nanny, and lots more.



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
